title: Runes
body: There is a bug with the rune pages right now and it makes the game nearly unplayable. The issue with the rune pages is that you can't save your runes. It will then give a random set of runes, when you can save your runes it will STILL give a random rune page. I hope I'm not the only one experiencing this issue, this needs to be fixed right away!

replies.body: Yeah, this patch has completely broken the game. This and the huge MS increase are game-changing bugs that Riot doesn't seem to have acknowledged. Good job, Riot Games.

A clean reinstall has been reported successful for many (unfortunately not all) players experiencing Rune Page drama, so that's probably going to be your best bet. 

The easiest way to run a clean reinstall is via the Hextech Repair Tool: https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool

Another thing you could try would be to sync your computer clock, as that can sometimes cause weird issues.
